Module Assignment
Package interfaces

Interface ICampUpdateService

All Known Implementing Classes:
CampUpdateService
public interface ICampUpdateService
The ICampUpdateService interface defines methods for updating camp information.

  • Method Summary

    • updateCampName

      boolean updateCampName(Camp camp, String newCampName)
      Updates the name of the specified camp.
      Parameters:
      camp - the Camp to update
      newCampName - the new name for the camp
      Returns:
      true if the update is successful, false otherwise
